mapper.insert: insert into t_operation_log (id, module_id, module_name, operation_type, library_id, library_name, user_id, login_name, user_name, ip, op_content, remark, create_time) values (#{id}, #{moduleId}, #{moduleName}, #{operationType}, #{libraryId}, #{libraryName}, #{userId}, #{loginName}, #{userName}, #{ip}, #{opContent}, #{remark}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT u.login_name loginName, p.username userName, org.name libraryName FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_people p ON u.id = p.user_id left join t_organization org on org.id=u.org_id WHERE u.id = #{userId}
